samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control shows the basic rendering of the pivotgrid with minimum configuration

samples.name: Local Data
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control demonstrate the basic rendering of the pivotgrid widget with local JSON data

samples.name: Remote Data
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control demonstrate the basic rendering of the pivotgrid widget with remote data or service data

samples.name: Field List
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control demonstrate the field list feature of the pivotgrid widget, field list allows the user to rearrange the fields between different axes, including column, row, value, and filter along with filter and sort options

samples.name: Grouping Bar
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control demonstrate the grouping bar feature of the pivotgrid widget, grouping bar allows the user to rearrange the fields between different axes, including column, row, value, and filter along with filter and sort options

samples.name: Conditional Formatting
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control demonstrate formatting the appearance of the pivot grid cells with values based on the applied conditions

samples.name: Calculated Field
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control shows calculated field, and it allows users to add calculated items either through a dialog window at run time or through code behind

samples.name: Aggregation
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control shows different types of aggregation for value fields

samples.name: Default Sorting
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control shows ordering(sorting) of fields either in ascending or descending order

samples.name: Value Sorting
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control shows sorting values on column or row wise

samples.name: Default Filtering
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control demonstrate member filtering of field headers either by including or excluding them

samples.name: Label Filtering
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control demonstrate label filtering of field headers either by including or excluding them

samples.name: Value Filtering
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control demonstrate the filtering of field headers based on the grand total (value based)

samples.name: Chart
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control demonstrate integration of pivot table data into a simple chart widget

samples.name: Virtual Scrolling
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control shows virtual scrolling option available vertically and horizontally to load large records with ease

samples.name: Export
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Pivot Table control demonstrate client-side exporting of the pivotgrid widget to Excel, CSV and PDF formats
